alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Cortland, east central Tompkins and northwestern Chenango Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to Dryden. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cortland, Virgil, Dryden, Solon, Cincinnatus, McGraw, Marathon, Pitcher, Lapeer and Taylor. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.
